question: Which of the following is incorrect about the Rajya Sabha ?
option1: The Rajya Sabha consists of 12 members nominated by the Prime Minister.
option2: One-third of its members retire every second year.
option3: The Rajya Sabha is not subject to dissolution.
option4: The Vice President is the ex-officio chairman of the Rajya Sabha.
answer: The Rajya Sabha consists of 12 members nominated by the Prime Minister.
explanation: According to the Constitution the Rajya Sabha shall consist of 250 members, of which 12 members shall be nominated by the President.
